code: import React,{useState}from'react';import certificateImage from'../assets/images/zero_to_hero_python.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Awards=()=>{const[showCertificate,setShowCertificate]=useState(false);const certificate={title:"The Complete Python Bootcamp From Zero to Hero in Python",organization:"Udemy",year:"2023",description:"Comprehensive Python programming course covering fundamentals to advanced concepts including OOP, game development, GUI creation, and professional Python applications.",image:certificateImage};const toggleCertificate=()=>{setShowCertificate(!showCertificate);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"awards",className:"awards",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Certificates"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"awards-grid",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"award-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"award-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:certificate.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"organization",children:certificate.organization}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"year",children:certificate.year})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:certificate.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"view-certificate-btn",onClick:toggleCertificate,children:"\uD83D\uDCDC View Certificate"})]})}),showCertificate&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"certificate-modal",onClick:toggleCertificate,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"certificate-content",onClick:e=>e.stopPropagation(),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"close-btn",onClick:toggleCertificate,children:"\xD7"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:certificate.image,alt:"Python Bootcamp Certificate"})]})})]});};export default Awards;
